parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Math - Vectors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds two 3D vectors. Replaces [[BIS_fnc_vectorAdd]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vector1 [[vectorAdd]] vector2

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vector1: [[Array]] - vector 3D or 2D (since Arma 3 v1.99.146539, z coordinate is defaulted to 0)

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vector2: [[Array]] - vector 3D or 2D (since Arma 3 v1.99.146539, z coordinate is defaulted to 0)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([[velocity]] unit1 [[vectorAdd]] [[velocity]] unit2);</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[5,10,5] [[vectorAdd]] [5,5,10]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value> returns [10,15,15]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[0,0] [[vectorAdd]] [1,-2]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value> returns [1,-2,0]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[vectorDiff]], [[vectorCrossProduct]], [[vectorDotProduct]], [[vectorCos]], [[vectorMagnitude]], [[vectorMagnitudeSqr]], [[vectorMultiply]], [[vectorDistance]], [[vectorDistanceSqr]], [[vectorDir]], [[vectorUp]], [[setVectorDir]], [[setVectorUp]], [[setVectorDirAndUp]], [[matrixMultiply]], [[matrixTranspose]]
</value></part></template>
